item.title: WorldSimBench: Towards Video Generation Models as World Simulators
item.description: WorldSimBench is a new benchmark for evaluating video generation models as ‘World Simulators,’ focusing on their ability to generate actionable videos. It uses a dual evaluation approach (explicit pe…..
